H0.text: when does april fools day end at noon. March 32nd

H1.text: when does april fools day end at noon. January 1st

H2.text: when does april fools day end at noon. February 29th

H3.text: when does april fools day end at noon. April 1st

A4.text: a study in the 1950s, by folklorists Iona and Peter Opie, found that in the UK, and in countries whose traditions derived from the UK, this continues to be the practice, with the custom ceasing at noon, after which time it is no longer acceptable to play pranks
